overall.description: Under Main Setup (press M), browse the Pre-Built Scenarios. Or, continue a previously saved game by clicking Load from File. Saving frequently is recommended. To start from scratch, go to Overall Settings and describe your idea, along with a title. Next, add a few initial items or characters. More can be set up as the game goes along. An AI can provide lists of choices like a tabletop manual, or add factual details.
overall.title: Generic Adventure
